name: brasero
deps: gst_plugin_base, itstool, libcanberra, libnotify, gobject_introspection, libburn, libisofs, totem_pl_parser, traker, dvd+rw_tools, gvfs, cdrdao, libdvdcss, cdrtools
desc:
Brasero is an application used to burn CD/DVD on the GNOME 
Desktop. It is designed to be as simple as possible and has some 
unique features that enable users to create their discs easily 
and quickly.
